page.title: 20DOING THE DOMESDAY PROJECT
page.content: Our area was split into two equal sections.The six eastern squares were covered by Stockingford Middle School. Third year children (aged 10_11)worked on the project.The childen visited each square and travelled by car to the most distant areas.Parents assisted with transport.Robinsons End Middle School covered the six western squares.Mr.Mick McGraw (Stockingford) and Mrs.Heather Hall (Robinsons End) met to collate the information and work the two schools had collected. Many of the children live in the area and even more actually visit the area to play or to meet friends.A large number of parents also work in the area in shops,at the hospital,on the industrial estates or in other small businesses.Almost eveyone we have approached in connection with the project has been helpful and friendly.
